alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:35PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Schleicher, Kimble, southern Menard, southwestern Mason and Sutton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yates Crossing to 12 miles south of The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Junction, Telegraph, Yates Crossing, Saline, Segovia, London, South Llano River State Park, Roosevelt, Us-277 Near The Sutton-Schleicher County Line, The Intersection Of Us-277 And Ranch Road 189, I-10 Near The Sutton-Kimble County Line, Cleo, Us-83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line, I-10 Near The Kimble-Kerr County Line, The Intersection Of I-10 And Us 290. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 393 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
